description:
Hideyoshi’s strategy is ruthless. 15,000 troops of the allied forces of Toyotomi storm Hachioji Castle. Even the women and children are not spared; the utterly gruesome rout is over in a single day.  Hojo Ujimasa and Ujinao get the news of their fallen castle, and lose their will to fight when Hideyoshi’s Ishigaki Castle suddenly appears.  Kanetsugu questions Kagekatsu about their lopsided victory ...
Source: crunchyroll
